== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&micro;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b5/index.htm U+000B5].
  * `&micro` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b5/index.htm U+000B5].
